description.value: If words could kill, the poet might rule the world. Your words can. You gain the Bon Mot skill feat . You can spend a Mythic Point when rolling the Diplomacy check for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Bon Mot] to attempt the check at mythic proficiency. If the check succeeds, you can also deal mental damage equal to your level to the target (double on a critical success).
